resources.string: Enhance your home with beautiful hardwood flooring that fits your budget. Full of abundant character and color variation.
This 5-ply cross grain engineered hardwood flooring is made from genuine domestic white birch hardwood and is for indoor, residential use.
The natural styling of this durable, traditional cherry hardwood flooring creates a sense of comfort and serenity bringing the outside in.
Scroll through the items, and click on what you\'d like to add to your cart.
